definitions.definition: The cry used in a game of snap when winning a hand .
"I've got one the same!", " Me too !"
examples: Snap! We've both got pink buckets and spades.

definitions.definition: Used in place of an expletive to express surprise , usually in response to a negative statement or news ; often used facetiously .
examples: I just ran over your phone with my car. —Oh, snap !

definitions.definition: Used after something is said by two people at exactly the same time .

main_definition: The cry used in a game of snap when winning a hand .
secondary_definitions: ( British , Australia , by extension ) "I've got one the same!", " Me too !"
( British , by extension ) Used to express agreement .
( Canada , US ) Used in place of an expletive to express surprise , usually in response to a negative statement or news ; often used facetiously .
( British , Australia , New Zealand ) Used after something is said by two people at exactly the same time .
